Contains the local equivalent of the TAX calculated on the CHG.AMOUNT when the CHARGE.TYPE is defined in a foreign currency.This field contains the local equivalent calculated at the time the tax on the commission is calculated.
Standard amount field

Contains the exchange rate used to derive the TAX.AMT.CHG.LCY from the foreign amount of TAX calculated on the charge amount in TAX.AMT.CHG The rate used will be the Mid-Rate at the time of calculation of the TAX amount
Standard ratefield
